remarks: Group multiple of a sum, for nonnegative multiples.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Dec-2014.)
statement:
mulgdi.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
mulgdi.m $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
mulgdi.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
mulgnn0di $p |- ( ( G e. CMnd /\ ( M e. NN0 /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> ( M .x. ( X .+ Y ) ) = ( ( M .x. X ) .+ ( M .x. Y ) ) ) $.
